item.content:encoded:
Read right-side magazines and left-side newspapers to grasp viewpoints of right / left wing for “Unification Church”

“Seiron”

産経新聞出版局, サンケイ出版, and 産業経済新聞社. 1973. 正論 産経新聞出版局. https://ci.nii.ac.jp/ncid/AN00370131.

  • 2022 Feb, no articles mentioning this topic
  • 2022 Mar, some articles touched the concept of “family” which seems deeply affected by doctrines of “Unification Church” yet did not mention the term “Unification Church”
  • no mention to “Unification Church” untill 2022 Oct
    • 2022 Oct, mentioned “Unification Church” in some articles
    • one mentioned the relationships between religious corporations and LDP since LDP is currently making a coalition with New Komeito, which has Soka Gakkai (Buddhism New Religious Movement in Japan) as power base
    • one justified its relationships with “Unification Church” arguing how the impact of the church was small for the ruling party, Liberal Democratic Party (LDP)
    • one critisized both right and left wing for this problem while partly praised the “Unification Church” related organizations works, especially related to N. Korea’s kidnappping of Japanese

After Oct 2022, have not talked about “Unification Church” and its related issues

Akahata (newspaper published by Japanese Communist Party, JCP)

赤旗編集局, 日本共産党中央委員会機関紙誌業務部, and 日本共産党中央委員会出版局. 2004. しんぶん赤旗. 縮刷版[CD-ROM] ed. 日本共産党中央委員会機関紙誌業務部; 日本共産党中央委員会出版局 (発売). https://ci.nii.ac.jp/ncid/AA11954267.

  • Skim through Oct 2022 to Dec 2022
  • every once or twice a week they mentioned “Unification Church” and related columns such as interviewing for former follower of “Unification Church” or Jehovah’s Witnesses, viewpoints from professionals
  • they worked hard for this problem, but it may because “Unification Church” has been cooporative with LDP, and generally akahata newspaper tend to critisize LDP
Oct 2022
Nov 2022
My reflection through this reading

Left-side newspapers tend to critisize conservatives due to “connection with ‘Unification Church’ related organizations,” however, left-side newspapers often interviewed or introduced “second-generations” perspectives. Personally those “second-generations” should also aware of making connections with certain political sides; otherwise they are doing same thing as “Unification Church” did.

The follower of “Unification Church” sued local authority because of “violation of Freedom of Faith”

On the December 16, 2022, one man sued Toyama city because of the resolution of terminating the relation to former “Unification Church” was passed the Toyama city congress.

The man claimed that Toyama city congressman and congresswoman refused his proposal to bring his petition against this resolution and it is the violation of right to petition, the fundamental part of democracy.

item.content:encoded:
“Requesting Reports and Asking Questions” – Religious Corporations Act Article 78-2

  • Since Janurary 4, “Requesting Reports and Asking Questions” has been attempted twice by Agency for Cultural Affairs under controll of Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology (MEXT).
  • The Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology heard the opinions of an advisory council, Religious Corporations Council.
  • “Requesting Reports and Asking Questions” had added for the article because of terrorism, mainly tokyo subway sarin attack, by Aum Shinrikyo but was never attempted until Novemver 22, 2022.
What is the right of “Requesting Reports and Asking Questions” or “questioning right”

This right can be excercised if the one who are in religious organization continuously violates law or the organization caused serious damage.
After examining reports, the minister of MEXT can ask order of dissolution of the religious organization for the court. When the court finds a cause, it may order the dissolution of the religious corporation.

The contents of reports and questions will not publish for certain period because of “privacy for both sides.”

First Attempt

First Attempt had excused on November 22, 2022. Based on MEXT, they asked for “Unification Church” to answer about the documents related to operation of organization, statements, documents and acconting book related to thier assets.

The answer was recieved by Agency for Cultural Affairs on December 9, 2022. However, the Agency said the reports from “Unification Church” were not enough, so they re-attempted the right on December 14, 2022 again.

Second Attempt

Since the first attempt could not gain enough information from “Unification Church,” the Agency for Cultural Affairs re-attempted excersicing “questioning right” for the church.

References

Religious Corporation Act
news article by Japan Broadcasting Corporation, public media

“旧統一教会に「質問権」 行使は初めて 解散命令に該当か調査へ: NHK.” NHKニュース. Japan Broadcasting Corporation, November 22, 2022. https://www3.nhk.or.jp/news/html/20221122/k10013899551000.html.

Trying to correct twitter data

Today I found I can use cloud server to run this program and it makes easier the project.

However, since Twitter’s problem, I can’t verify my twtter developer account for last few days (I’m writing this on Jan 5). So I just read and summarize on current news about “Unification Church” for next few days.

Updated on Jan 8
Finally Twitter sent me the verification code, so I run the code below. However it said I need Elevated access to run this script, so I am now requesting Eleveted API access for Twitter. FAQ and developer forum suggests it usually takes less than a week.

For example, I will run the script below to correct tweets related to “Unification Church.”

gathertw.sh -l ja -o ja --sincedt=20220707 -c -- 統一 OR 統一教会 OR 文鮮明 OR 韓鶴子 OR 家庭連合 OR 祝福2世 OR 祝福二世 OR 祝福２世

item.content:encoded:
Correcting Twitter data as a piece of public opinion

From today, I am going to work on correcting Twitter posts related to “Unification Church” and “Second Generation.”

Based on this project, I will use “Kotoriotoko” to gather twitter posts. This is open source software build by Japanese scholars, and seems easy to run. However, since I aim to gather two different but overlapping concepts, I need two separate computers that can run this program 24/7. Fortunately I have one old computer that I barely use, so first computer would be that one. For my second computer, I could buy new small computer for this research using new year discounts or borrow unused computer from group home.

I could not verify my phone number to Twitter account which I want to use, so I am going to get another phone number for this project and one-month trip to Japan.

item.title: Translation of the Guidelines for Spiritual-related Child Abuses
item.dc:creator: sato
item.description: 1. Abstract Background Concepts The child guidance center must take action, including temporary custody, to secure the child’s safety when a custodian commits “child abuse” (used in the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act) based on the faith of particular religion or belief system (Inspiration or any other method that is almost impossible to demonstrate […]
item.content:encoded:
1. Abstract

Background Concepts

The child guidance center must take action, including temporary custody, to secure the child’s safety when a custodian commits “child abuse” (used in the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act) based on the faith of particular religion or belief system (Inspiration or any other method that is almost impossible to demonstrate and that arouses personal fear.)

When the center finds a possibility of ongoing child abuse, they are required to judge comprehensively, including the situations of children and custodians, such as living environment, rather than following examples from the Q&A section. The judgment must be made by the children’s side.

The response for those other than custodians

Abuse of a child could be punished by applying Penal Code such as Assault, Indecency through Compulsion, Abandonment by a Person Responsible for Their Care, and anyone dictating or advising these acts for custodians could constitute co-principals, inducements, or accessories; thus, one should accuse the case for police timely.

2. Categorizations of possible scenarios

3. Points to be considered for response to abuse and encouraging independence

  • It is highly possible that children who experienced abuse related to religion are strongly affected by religious doctrine and find it hard to recognize and appeal to their situation, which has problems. Assessing their environment objectively and explaining or instructing the definition of child abuse for children and guardians.
    However, because the guidance might not be enough to change the behavior or thoughts of custodians based on religious doctrine against children, and there are concerns that the escalation of abusing by custodians or intervening for a family from religious organizations with the guidance as a trigger, securing the children’s safety is the priority so that taking temporary custody pursuant without hesitation will be necessary if needed.
  • If those who the age over 18 years old come to talk about their problem, introducing the use of Youth Independent Assistance Homes (kind of group home) and discussing the next steps following their mind is required. If they do not seek to use Youth Independent Assistance Homes, proactive outreaching is required despite their age (in japan, youths over 18 years considered as adult). List up and organize their particular problems and build a connection with the Japan Legal Support Center, welfare offices, or other sorts of related institutions/organizations.
  • In case of judging whether each issue is child abuse or not, the child guidance center must make a decision examining multiple sides such as children’s condition, guardians’ condition, and living environments; thus, it can be child abuse if there are only minor actions.

4. Available Public Supports (abb.)

Translation of Child Welfare Act

item.content:encoded:
Read News Articles and Press Conferences by “Unification Church”, Day 4

Fifth Press Conference
  • Held on October 4th
  • Confirmed there are victims of spiritual sales by “Unification Church” but its numbers are “very small”
  • Require recipt for donations over 30% of monthly salary

At this conference, the church changed its statement about spiritual sales. They confirmed there are “very little numbers” of spiritual sales cases because National Consumer Affairs of Japan announced there are cases related to spiritual sales by “Unification Church.” Also they revealed newly established standard for donation, which is 30% of the monthly salary. They also introduced “Family Counselors” who help pious families.

Fifth Press Conference (10/4): news article

“【解説】「旧統一教会」が5回目の会見…献金継続を宣言『月収３割まで搾り取られるおそれ』消費生活センターに教会関係者「相談内容を教えて」と問い合わせ…元信者のジャーナリスト「トップダウンで組織的に動いている証拠」: TBS News Dig (1ページ).” TBS NEWS DIG. TOKYO BROADCASTING SYSTEM TELEVISION, INC, October 5, 2022. https://newsdig.tbs.co.jp/articles/-/171184?display=1.

Fifth Press Conference (10/4): video

Sixth Press Conference
  • Held on October 20th
  • Announced its attitude against “Requesting Reports and Asking Questions” based on Religious Corporations Act Article 78-2
  • Show up 20 of “second generations” who promoted to “district leaders” (out of 68 seats)

Sixth Press Conference (10/20): news article

“「反省のかけらも感じないひどい会見、全体の紛争を矮小化している」　旧統一教会6度目の会見　元2世信者は二転三転の政府をどう見たか　紀藤正樹弁護士の解説: 特集: 報道ランナー: ニュース: 関西テレビ放送 カンテレ.” 報道ランナー | ニュース. Kansai Television Co. Ltd., October 20, 2022. https://www.ktv.jp/news/feature/221020-1/.

Read News Articles and Press Conferences by “Unification Church”, Day 3

Third Press Conference
  • Held at September 22nd, about half and a hour
  • Announcement of “the headquaters for Church Reform” and claim their innocence for spiritual sales
  • Counter argument for newly proposed “anti-sect” bill in Japanese parlament

In the conference, the church again claimed their innocence for the spiritual sales and justify their pious members’ “immoderate donation.”

Also they talked about “anti-Japaneseness” of their doctrine and their relationships with North Korea. As a opinion, they mentioned how Sun Myung Moon worked for Japan through helping to pass the anti-spying bill. Later they added they never sent money for North Korea.

Third Press Conference (9/22): script

“【全文ノーカット】「宗教として尊敬と信頼を」「2009年以降 ‘霊感商法‘1件もない」旧統一教会が「教会改革推進本部」設置　会見で何を語ったか: TBS News Dig (1ページ).” TBS NEWS DIG. TOKYO BROADCASTING SYSTEM TELEVISION, INC., September 23, 2022. https://newsdig.tbs.co.jp/articles/-/160821?display=1.

Forth Press Conference
  • Held at September 29th, short conference
  • Announcement of the lawsuit about “defamation” against “Unification Church” by TV shows

Norishige Kondo (近藤 徳茂), Deputy Director of General Affairs Bureau of “Unification Church,” said “followers of the church are suffering due to biased reports.” Syuya Fukumoto (福本 修也), the lawyer and pious follower of “Unification Church,” insisted on “we will stand firmly against these reports.”

Forth Press Conference (9/29): news article

“旧統一教会、民放と弁護士提訴　情報番組で発言「名誉毀損」―東京地裁：時事ドットコム.” 時事ドットコム. Jiji Press Ltd., September 29, 2022. https://www.jiji.com/jc/article?k=2022092900862&g=soc.

item.content:encoded:
Read News Articles and Press Conferences by “Unification Church”, Day 2

As I did yesterday, I would like to continue to catch up on the current situation of “Unification Church” related issues in Japan. For today, I am going to focus on the press conferences and the announcements by the Church. It is a rare opportunity for us to grasp what they perceive and think about the problem, especially related to the “second generation.”

First Press Conference
  • Held at July 11th, about a hour
  • Describe the official view of Mr. Abe’s assassination of the Church

Basically, they excused themselves by explaining their doctrine and claimed their innocence for the assassination.

First Press Conference (7/11): script

Yokoyama, Kotaro, and Rio Nishiyama, eds. “旧・統一教会が会見｢動機だとすれば重く受け止める｣田中会長が語る【会見全文】.” BUSINESS INSIDER JAPAN. BUSINESS INSIDER JAPAN, July 29, 2022. https://www.businessinsider.jp/post-256503.

Second Press Conference
  • Held at August 10th, about a hour
  • Their claim for spiritual sales and their political activities

At the press conference, the president of the Japanese “Unification Church,” Tomihiro Tanaka, made it clear that they are no more committing to spiritual sales, which was once a social problem in Japan about 40 years ago. He also resorted to the Church getting unreasonable discrimination and hatred rooted in “biased reporting” by the media. He said the current environment surrounding the Church violates freedom of religion.

When he talked about “biased coverage,” he pointed out that the media only convey the thoughts of “ex-Moonies” while omitting the viewpoints or “success stories” of pious Moonies.

Second Press Conference (8/10): script

“【全文ノーカット】旧統一教会・田中富広会長会見「政治的介入や不正はない」: TBS News Dig (1ページ).” TBS NEWS DIG. TOKYO BROADCASTING SYSTEM TELEVISION, INC.　, August 10, 2022. https://newsdig.tbs.co.jp/articles/-/120753?display=1.

item.content:encoded:
Read News Articles and Press Conferences by “Unification Church” – Day 1

Since I have not been in Japan for about four months, I am not knowledgeable about the current situation in Japan. Thus, I decided to read some articles about the “Unification Church” from mainstream media.

Before starting my journal, I would like to convey the use of the “Unification Church” in Japan. Pious believers of “Unification Church” are known as “Moonies” in English, and they changed their name to “The Family Federation for World Peace and Unification” for the sake of erasing its notoriety. However, because the term “Unification Church” is widely recognized in Japan, the media continues to use “Unification Church.”

For the next five to eight days, I will read as many Japanese articles for several fields and summarize them in English. The summarization would be the journal for the first days of Japan since

  1. Prevent spreading COVID, R.S.V., flu around by interviewing people in-person;
  2. Re-capping current Japanese media’s attitude towards the “Unification Church” and its related problems;
  3. Jet lag might not allow me to behave like those in Japan.

Today, I will focus on the dynamic changes in the media’s way of presenting this issue to the public.

The situation surrounding media have been shifting quickly. Before I left Japan, most of the media didn’t mention the “Unification Church,” Instead, they called it “the Religious Group.” I don’t know why they didn’t say about the “Unification Church” despite the media from the US or Europe mentioning the “Unification Church” or “Moonies” at that moment. However, this weird regard didn’t last long.

On July 11th, the head of the Church’s Japanese organization held a press conference to express their official statements with a “selected” medium. After the first conference, all the TVs and newspapers started to use “Unification Church” because finally they could convey both sides information about the problem. After the conference, the “Unification Church” organized some conferences so tomorrow, I will focus on these events and other announcements from the Church.
